mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Sine, Joseph E.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Woodstock, Shenandoah Co., VA [Woodstock, Shenandoah County, Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Sine, Joseph E. Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of right forearm. Musket ball entered at external side lower third of ulna passed downward and inward and out lower external of ulna. Result: Returned to duty.
